course_description: Topics are drawn from contemporary philosophical discussions, for example, the nature of the self, reason's relation to affect, the authority of science, or the politics of poetry.
prerequisites: Two PHIL courses or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1700, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: A. Karera, Status: Open
